abstract: UBS reports second-quarter profit of 1.21 billion Swiss francs, around $1.26 billion, up 53 percent from 792 million francs in year-earlier period; operating income, which is similar to revenue, rose 9 percent to 7.82 billion francs, from 7.15 billion francs in second quarter of 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss bank said its profit of about $1.26 billion was driven by gains in its wealth management business, particularly in the Asia-Pacific region.

headline.main: UBS Profit Increases 53% in Second Quarter
headline.print_headline: Gains in Wealth Management Lift UBS Earnings

snippet: The Swiss bank said its profit of about $1.26 billion was driven by gains in its wealth management business, particularly in the Asia-Pacific region.
